---
title: "Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Transfer Keys Update"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Protocol"
publishDate: "Wed Sep 18 2024 22:31:38 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "This new feature makes the transfer key capability easier to access from the Unlock Labs dashboard app."
image: "/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--transfer-keys-update/2792f06785aaf42234779e886a5bba93.jpg"
---

![Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Transfer Keys Update](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/2792f06785aaf42234779e886a5bba93.jpg)

<p>Unlock Protocol provides a native mechanism for transferring and lending onchain memberships, subscriptions, and tickets. This new feature makes the key transfer capability easier to access from the Unlock Labs dashboard app.</p><p>A new menu item, “Transfer membership,” has been added to the dropdown menu for each membership, subscription, or ticket in the Unlock Labs dashboard.</p><p></p><figure float="none" width="466px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 466px;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--transfer-keys-update/f4afc6c1b6c5552cec94c2e6ca8faf59.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1025" nextwidth="824" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p></p><figure float="none" width="456px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 456px;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--transfer-keys-update/40c15f38472a0e3066802477333eee67.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="996" nextwidth="812" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p></p><p>Transferring keys in Unlock Protocol is straightforward, and it's important to note that this functionality can be controlled by the lock manager. For example, even when transfers are generally disabled, the lock manager retains the ability to transfer keys.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-technical-details-key-management-functions"><strong>Technical Details: Key Management Functions</strong></h2></div><p>Unlock Protocol provides two important functions for managing key transfers and loans:</p><ul><li><p><strong>lendKey</strong>: This function enables a key manager to lend a key to another user.</p></li><li><p><strong>unlendKey</strong>: This function allows a key manager to recover a previously lent key.</p></li></ul><p>These functions give key managers flexibility in sharing access to locked content or resources without permanently relinquishing ownership of the key.</p><p>The ability to lend keys is a powerful feature of Unlock Protocol, as it allows for more dynamic and flexible management of access rights to subscriptions and memberships.</p><p><strong><em>Note: </em></strong><em>This feature was implemented through payment of a bounty to a member of the Unlock Protocol Locksmith community. Interested in picking up a bounty? </em><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://github.com/unlock-protocol/unlock/labels/%F0%9F%92%B0bounty"><em>Check out the open bounties here</em></a><em>.</em></p><p></p>
